chapterOverview: Chapter 1 of Mathematics class 10 introduces the concept of real numbers and their properties. It covers topics such as rational and irrational numbers, the decimal representation of rational numbers, operations on real numbers, and the Euclidean division algorithm. The chapter focuses on understanding the properties and relationships of real numbers and their applications in solving mathematical problems.
